title: Ravens Rebound, Stefon Diggs extension, Lions Draft strategy, Mathieu Options, and Sanders Stories
itunes:title: Ravens Rebound, Stefon Diggs extension, Lions Draft strategy, Mathieu Options, and Sanders Stories
description:
The Ravens are talking about rebounding with vengeance as The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Lamar Jackson's future.  Hosts Jane Slater, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Emmanuel Sanders discuss BREAKING News on Stefon Diggs getting a big extension with the Bills. Turning to the Draft, the crew looks at what the Lions should do at #2 and how the Giants could be shopping for a QB.  Emmanuel shares his workout stories with Peyton Manning and Drew Brees while explaining why the Bengals have the best WR corps in the NFL.  We wrap up with the options facing Tyrann Mathieu and could New Orleans be the perfect fit?

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
